overview: Girlfriends Films presents Women Seeking Women Volume 71! This film is for fine folks with good hearts and curious minds. Over 2 hours of hot sensual lesbian sex starring Hana Black, Indian Summer, Juliana Jolene, Madison Young, Prinzzes, Sophia Sutra, Vicki Chase and Wenona. These restless hearts are searching for that perfect woman.
tagline: Restless Hearts Searching For That One Perfect Woman
title: Women Seeking Women 71
